    Class TextControl

    Attached behavior that supports dynamic text highlighting for controls derived from or .

    TextProperty

    Attached property to serve as alternative text property for the (instead of using ). Optional property to use with (instead of ). The defined HighlightRange items contained in the attached property HighlightRangesProperty collection will always be applied to and the TextProperty values.

    Remarks
